Text:
Tried to watch lots of pixelation and the motion is studdered. Very distracting. Also any nudity is blurred out. This show aired on STARZ, same as Spartacus so I do not know how the editing came about. Will delete and wait for better version. Thank you for your efforts! It is appreciated.

A/V = 9/7

I downloaded, and began watching then stopped.
Nudity being blurred out is a turnoff.
If Starz wants to compete with HBO, it should not make the show almost unwatchable.  I'll stick with HBO shows, more watchable.
